name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.block.write.retries
description:
The number of retries for writing blocks to the data nodes, 
  before we signal failure to the application.

name: dfs.datanode.min.outlier.detection.nodes
description: Minimum number of nodes to run outlier detection.

name: dfs.webhdfs.ugi.expire.after.access
description:
How long in milliseconds after the last access
      the cached UGI will expire. With 0, never expire.

name: dfs.namenode.list.encryption.zones.num.responses
description:
When listing encryption zones, the maximum number of zones
    that will be returned in a batch. Fetching the list incrementally in
    batches improves namenode performance.

name: dfs.datanode.data.write.bandwidthPerSec
description:
Specifies the maximum amount of bandwidth that the data transfering can utilize for writing block or pipeline
      recovery when
      BlockConstructionStage is PIPELINE_SETUP_APPEND_RECOVERY or PIPELINE_SETUP_STREAMING_RECOVERY.
      When the bandwidth value is zero, there is no limit.

name: dfs.blockreport.incremental.intervalMsec
description:
If set to a positive integer, the value in ms to wait between sending
    incremental block reports from the Datanode to the Namenode.
